Articles.Content:
Today, there was a free air show at Little Rock, Arkansas. My family and I live very close to it, so we see it just about every year. This time was different because I had KSP on my mind the whole time.

These are the only snapshots that came out well, hosted on imgur:

http://imgur.com/a/Fo6BZ/

Most of these images are the Blue Angels, where you can find more at thier official site:

http://www.blueangels.navy.mil/

I can upload some of my movies to youtube later, but I'm going AFK for an hour or so.

I used to live half an hour from Miramar about the time that Top Gun came out, when the armed forces went all-out to exploit the free publicity as a recruiting tool. That spoiled me on airshows. Nothing else seemed impressive after that.

Nice. I went to a Dallas airshow a few years ago and they had the Blue Angels, an F-22, and some other stuff like this:

Now this is Kerbal.
